articles.title: Verify: No, AstraZeneca's vaccine does not have tissue from an aborted fetus in it - CBS News 8
articles.description: A viral claim online says the company's vaccine contains lung tissue from an aborted fetus in it. It does not.
articles.content: WASHINGTON The majority of the COVID-19 vaccines come from relatively new biotechnology. With that new technology comes new speculation. A viral video online claims one of the vaccines has tissue fro… [+3252 chars]
